original_text: They do not lie with the brave dead soldiers of long ago. Those men went down into their graves with honour. People buried them with their weapons. They put their swords under their heads. When those brave men were alive, they caused people to be very afraid of them. They do not lie with the brave dead soldiers of long ago. Those men went down into their graves with honour. People buried them with their weapons. They put their swords under their heads. When those brave men were alive, they caused people to be very afraid of them. They do not lie with the brave dead soldiers of long ago. Those men went down into their graves with honour. People buried them with their weapons. They put their swords under their heads. When those brave men were alive, they caused people to be very afraid of them.
korean_text: 그들이 할례를 받지 못한 자 가운데에 이미 엎드러진 용사와 함께 누운 것이 마땅하지 아니하냐 이 용사들은 다 무기를 가지고 스올에 내려가서 자기의 칼을 베개로 삼았으니 그 백골이 자기 죄악을 졌음이여 생존하는 사람들의 세상에서 용사의 두려움이 있던 자로다

sentences.original_text: They do not lie with the brave dead soldiers of long ago.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예의 용맹한 죽은 군인들과 함께 눕지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: Those men went down into their graves with honour.
People buried them with their weapons.
They put their swords under their heads.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 칼을 머리 아래에 두었습니다.

sentences.original_text: When those brave men were alive,
they caused people to be very afraid of them.
They do not lie with the brave dead soldiers of long ago.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예의 용맹한 죽은 군인들과 함께 눕지 않습니다.
